name: G-LifeSmart
0:

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your G-Life Smart products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “G-Life Smart” app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “G-Life Smart” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “G-Life Smart” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on the thermostat.
Alexa, turn off the thermostat.
Alexa, set the temperature to twenty-five.
Alexa, set the room thermostat to economy mode.
Alexa, set the room thermostat to comfort mode.
Alexa, set the room thermostat to holiday mode.
Alexa, set the room thermostat to weekly program mode.
Alexa, set the room thermostat to heat mode.
Alexa, set the room thermostat to cool mode.
